definition: madder (Rubia cordifolia)/to hunt for/to gather/to collect
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
to collect and organize (papers etc)/to archive (data)/to summarize (evidence etc)/summary
to thumb through/to flip through (a book)
to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
old property (esp. inherited from former generation)/former territory
archive of graphics (e.g. maps, documents or botanical figures)/atlas/collection of illustrations or sheet music
lit. looking for a fine horse using only a picture (idiom)/fig. to do things along rigid, conventional lines/to try and find sth with the help of a clue
